pkgmetadata.longdescription: Cleaning Validation Functions for Pharmaceutical Cleaning Process // Provides essential Cleaning Validation functions for complying with pharmaceutical cleaning process regulatory standards. The package includes non-parametric methods to analyze drug active-ingredient residue (DAR), cleaning agent residue (CAR), and microbial colonies (Mic) for non-Poisson distributions. Additionally, Poisson methods are provided for Mic analysis when Mic data follow a Poisson distribution.
